pyutil.linktree module¶

From Python3.6 Examples in Ubuntu repositories.

Minor modifications for flake8, pydocstyle etc.

linktree

Make a copy of a directory tree with symbolic links to all files in the original tree. All symbolic links go to a special symbolic link at the top, so you can easily fix things if the original source tree moves.

Usage::
mklinks oldtree newtree

See also “mkreal”.

pyutil.linktree.linknames(old, new, link)[source]¶

Recursively symlink a directory tree.

pyutil.linktree.main()[source]¶

Handle user inputs and initialize arguments.
